description: Bourbon Sidecar is a&nbsp;classic cocktail with a twist. It was invented in the 1920s and got its name from an American army captain who drove around in a motorcycle sidecar.The&nbsp;Sidecar&nbsp;is on the list of International Bartender Association's IBA official cocktails, meaning that there's an "official" definition of the Sidecar. Swap out the&nbsp;brandy for bourbon, and you've got the bourbon version!
name: Bourbon Sidecar
